name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠】わためぇ Night Fever!! in Zepp Tokyo [P_ptI5iH7Vg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Pre-show rules and informational slides regarding health safety, prohibited actions, and social media guidelines.
A slideshow presentation of flower stands sent by fans and groups for the event.
Showcase of various merchandise available for individual purchase.
Repeat of the pre-show rules and informational slides.
Repeat of the flower stand introduction slideshow.

subtitles.original:
Attention ご来場の皆さんへ
マスクの着用にご協力ください
subtitles.english:
Attention: To all attendees
Please cooperate by wearing a mask.

subtitles.original:
公演中に声を出しての応援はご遠慮ください
公演中は席の移動はお控えください
subtitles.english:
Please refrain from vocal cheering and from
moving between seats during the performance.

subtitles.original:
COCOAを使用していただけるため、携帯電話の
電源はお切りにならずマナーモードの設定を…
subtitles.english:
To allow the use of the COCOA app, please do
not turn off your phone; use silent mode...

subtitles.original:
…お願いします。撮影・録音・録画は
禁止とさせていただきます。
subtitles.english:
...instead. Photography, audio recording,
and filming are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original:
HASHTAG #わためソロライブ
SNSへの感想・スクショ投稿OK！
subtitles.english:
HASHTAG #WatameSoloLive
Posting impressions and screenshots to SNS is OK!

subtitles.original:
録音・録画・ミラー配信は禁止です。
開演までしばらくお待ちください。
subtitles.english:
Recording and mirror streaming are prohibited.
Please wait a moment until the show begins.

Flower Stands
フラワースタンド紹介
subtitles.english:
Flower Stands
Flower Stand Introduction
